prompt: Can I add a live translation app to calls?

hidden_queries: add live translation to phone calls translate calls app iPhone Android live call translation
Can you have live translation during phone calls what apps support real time translation on phone call
metadata.generated_search_query: add live translation to phone calls translate calls app iPhone Android live call translation

sources.title: Use Live Translation on iPhone - Apple Support
sources.snippet: Use Live Translation with the Messages app On your iPhone, go to the Messages app, and tap the message that you want to translate. In the message, tap the person's name at the top of the screen. Scroll down and tap to turn on Automatically Translate. Messages might detect the language used in the conversation and suggest it for translation.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Yes — you can add live translation to calls, but how you do it depends on your device and tools: iPhone (iOS 26+): Apple now offers a built-in Live Translation feature in the Phone app. During a one-on-one call, you can tap a “Live Translation” option to translate spoken language in real time, show translated text, and speak the translation aloud to the other person. Apple Support+1

sources.title: Use Live Translation on iPhone - Apple Support
sources.snippet: Use Live Translation with the Messages app On your iPhone, go to the Messages app, and tap the message that you want to translate. In the message, tap the person's name at the top of the screen. Scroll down and tap to turn on Automatically Translate. Messages might detect the language used in the conversation and suggest it for translation.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Requirements: iPhone that supports Apple Intelligence (e.g., iPhone 15 Pro or newer), iOS 26 or later, and the relevant language packs installed. Apple Support

Android / Pixel: Some Android phones (especially recent Google Pixel models) are rolling out call translation features that translate speech on-device during phone calls via a built-in AI voice translate tool. Availability may vary by region and model. Android Central
Samsung has Live Translate / Call Assist on supported Galaxy devices that offers two-way translation during calls. Wikipedia

sources.title: Telelingo - Real-Time Phone Call Translator
sources.snippet: Erase language barriers from phone calls Connect effortlessly across languages. Our cutting-edge AI translates your voice in real-time during phone calls.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Third-party apps: There are third-party phone call translator apps (e.g., apps like Lingvanex, Telelingo, EzDubs) that claim to translate calls in real time, but accuracy and experience vary greatly, and some replace voices with synthetic speech. Aiphone+1
Points to check before using: Language support is limited on built-in systems (Apple’s initial support covers a handful of major languages). MacRumors
